content.categories:
{
  "Packaging": "The review mentions packaging issues or compliments.",
  "Pricing": "The review discusses pricing concerns or satisfaction.",
  "Quality": "The review is about the quality of the product or service.",
  "Delivery": "The review relates to delivery times or issues.",
  "Empty": "A review is mentioned but the review cannot be found"
}

content.prompt:
Take the role of a customer success rep and draft an email response to the customer review below that mentions pricing: @{customer_review}

Respond to the customer’s comments on pricing. If it’s positive, thank them for recognizing the value. If it’s negative, empathize and briefly explain our pricing approach or any ongoing offers that may help.

Take the role of a customer success rep and draft an email response to the customer review below that mentions quality: @{customer_review}

Craft a response focused on product quality. Thank the reviewer if they’re satisfied. If not, apologize sincerely and offer help or a replacement, while reinforcing our commitment to high standards.

Take the role of a customer success rep and draft an email response to the customer review below that mentions delivery: @{customer_review}

Address the customer’s delivery experience. Thank them if it was smooth, or apologize and investigate if it was delayed or problematic. Reassure them we’re improving logistics and care about their satisfaction.
